title: Being Quick to Give God the Credit
itunes:title: Being Quick to Give God the Credit
description:
We were never created to contain glory. We were created to give God glory. The higher we go, the more humility we have to walk in and the more grateful we should be.Your best days are still ahead, and together we can make a difference in this world with the message of God's hope and love. To give visit JoelOsteen.com/GiveHope

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
